
<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"><tbody><tr><td class="t_f" id="postmessage_52388497">
<table cellspacing="0" class="t_table" style="width:98%"><tbody><tr><td><font color="#2265a9">windows11</font>&nbsp;&nbsp;添加网络打印机报错直接几步搞定<br>
<strong><font color="#ff0000">报错内容：你计算机上一个有效的策略使你无法连接到此打印队列。请与你的系统管理员联系。</font></strong><br>
<br>
<br>
简单直接几步搞定：<br>
控制面板---添加打印机---手动添加打印机---通过手动设置添加本地打印机或网络打印机---创建新端口---选择local Port----输入域名或IP打印机名（例如：\\WIN-6UATVJ2NPO1\HPlc1312)---选择打印机驱动（从磁盘添加或列表内选择打印机驱动）---等待添加完成。<br>
<br>
新装系统也不用去看繁琐教程，怎么改都不对，也无需找什么APP软件修复打印机，网络大部分都是错误指导。如我这样简单如丝，亲测无障碍。<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_WQ99f" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="600" file="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174752grllxbh75fwep667.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174752grllxbh75fwep667.png"><br>
手动添加打印机<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_KJfxG" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="600" file="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174753t76yfffo5fqcd61c.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174753t76yfffo5fqcd61c.png"><br>
通过手动设置添加本地打印机或网络打印机<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_sV3Ft" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="600" file="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174754x2gm0is41baoimb0.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174754x2gm0is41baoimb0.png"><br>
创建新端口---选择local Port<br>
<br>
<img id="aimg_kXj9O" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" width="600" file="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174755ei6fffnq4g3q3uzf.png" border="0" alt="" src="https://bbs.pcbeta.com/data/attachment/forum/202502/13/174755ei6fffnq4g3q3uzf.png"><br>
<br>
输入域名或IP打印机名（例如：\\WIN-6UATVJ2NPO1\HPlc1312)<br>
<br>
确定后下一步<br>
选择打印机驱动---从磁盘添加或列表内选择打印机驱动<br>
<br>
<br>
驱动安装就不上图了，到这里就已经成功了。</td></tr></tbody></table></td></tr></tbody></table>
